scripts.dev: yarn workspaces foreach -A --include backend --include app --parallel --jobs unlimited -v -i run start
scripts.ci//:
echo Installs dependencies without modifying the lockfile.
`yarn rebuild` was added because folders are randomly missing, this command fixes it.
scripts.iup//: echo 'Interactive upgrade of dependencies (do not touch packages with `backstage:^?)'
scripts.cup//: echo Custom UPdate - Install without lockfile forces yarn to look for latest version within ranges
scripts.pipeline//: echo Shorthand to run all checks in the lint.yml pipeline/workflow
scripts.pipeline: yarn run ci && yarn run prettier:check && yarn run lint:all && yarn run tsc
scripts.self-update//: Upgrade package manager to the latest version
scripts.rm-node-modules: yarn run _rm-node-modules && yarn workspaces foreach --all --parallel run rm-node-modules
scripts.ci:clean//: echo Removes installed modules before installing packages from lockfile.
scripts.ci:clean: yarn run clean-cache && yarn run rmnm && yarn run ci
scripts.update:clean//: echo Removes everything before updating packages
scripts.update:clean: yarn run fresh_clean && yarn run ci
scripts.fresh_clean//: echo Removes everything related to dependencies
scripts.fresh_clean: yarn run delete_yarn_lock && yarn run rmnm
